translation.en: [reporter] Tonight, all roads lead to Turbine Hall…
translation.es: Hoy todos los caminosllevan al Turbine Hall…

translation.en: [reporter] ...where Joburg's high-society will witness
the reveal of the first "Face of Bhengu Beauty,"
translation.es: conocerá a la primera carade Bhengu Beauty

translation.en: voted for by the public online.
Mogul Don Bhengu is expected to make a speech about these new changes
translation.es: Se espera que el magnate Don Bhenguhable sobre estos cambios

translation.en: and the future of the Bhengu Beauty empire.
translation.es: y sobre el futuro del imperiode Bhengu Beauty.

translation.en: I don't care that the partners want equity.
translation.es: Me da igual que los sociosquieran más participación.

translation.en: -Draw up the papers! -[glass clinks]
This expansion is happening on Don Bhengu's terms.
translation.es: La expansión se harácomo yo lo quiera.

translation.en: End of story.
Jesus!
I can talk to the Kenyans, Ngcolosi.
The last time I went to Nairobi they were putty in my hands.
translation.es: La última vez que fui a Nairobi,comían de mi mano.

translation.en: The new face of Bhengu must have mass appeal.
translation.es: La nueva cara de Bhengudebe hacerse popular.

translation.en: [in Sotho] They won’t need equity to make money…
[in English] Save that enthusiasm for telling the maid how to clean, Grace.
translation.es: Guarda ese entusiasmo para decirlea la empleada cómo limpiar.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I know you’re natural-born rubbish, Thando. [in English] Don't make it worse with your drinking.
translation.es: Ya eres ordinaria por naturaleza,no lo empeores bebiendo.

translation.en: Excuse me?
You had to be carried out at the minister's party.
translation.es: En la última fiesta,ni te mantenías en pie.

translation.en: [in Sotho] You disgraced our husband and the Bhengu name.
translation.es: Avergonzaste a nuestro maridoy a la familia Bhengu.

translation.en: [in English] Please, Grace, I was fine. You're the one that--
translation.es: Por favor, estaba perfecta.Tú eras la que…

translation.en: Don't make excuses for being low-class.
Tonight is about dignity.
Have some.
-And smile. -Enough.
You know, I can't believe they've got us here handing out goodie bags to guests.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? No puedo creerque nos toque repartir bolsas de regalos.

translation.en: I should be the face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.es: Yo debería ser la cara de Bhengu.

translation.en: [woman] I know, right. This Zinhle girl isn't even a real model.
translation.es: ¡Exacto!Esa tal Zinhle ni siquiera es modelo.

translation.en: And that's why you shouldn't allow the public to vote for the face of Bhengu.
translation.es: Por eso no debería ser el públicoquien elija a la cara de la compañía.

translation.en: Imagine being able to live with the Bhengu's.
Getting your own car, getting to know Grace.
translation.es: tener tu propio auto, conocer a Grace.

translation.en: [gasps] Even chilling with Phila Bhengu.
-Now you see that? -Oh my gosh. That's a different story.
translation.es: - ¿Ves? Eso ya es otra cosa.- ¡Dios mío!

translation.en: -Oh, he's so hot! -He's so hot! Oh, my God.
[woman 2] I'll tell him you say hi.
Let's go.
Shit! I have to go.
You guys just order whatever you want to, it's on me.
translation.es: Pidan lo que quieran, yo invito.

translation.en: Zinhle, where are you?
Oh my God, you're doing my job again.
translation.es: Dios mío, otra vezestás haciendo mi trabajo.

translation.en: It's just a little foundation, Sisi.
translation.es: Es solo un poco de base.

translation.en: My foundation, darling.
-But I like doing it. -That's okay, I'm fine with it.
translation.es: - Pero me gusta hacerlo.- Está bien, no me importa.

translation.en: [reporter] Past faces of Bhengu Beauty
translation.es: Hasta ahora,como la cara de Bhengu Beauty,

translation.en: have been supermodels, actresses, and celebrities.
translation.es: siempre vimos a supermodelos,actrices y famosas.

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty faced harsh criticism
over their overly-edited images
encouraging unrealistic standards of beauty.
Some wonder if the choice to go with an unknown face
translation.es: Algunos se preguntansi la elección de una cara desconocida

translation.en: signals real change at Bhengu Beauty
or is it simply lip service?
But as we can see tonight,
even though the public was asked to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.es: aunque se le pidió al públicoque votara por la cara de Bhengu,

translation.en: the only guests here are an elite bunch.
translation.es: los únicos invitadosson miembros de la élite.

translation.en: And now it seems Mr. Bhengu and his two wives have arrived.
translation.es: Y parece que aquí llegael Sr. Bhengu con sus dos esposas.

translation.en: Mr. Bhengu?
-Mr. Bhengu? -Hey, Angela. [chuckles]
[in Xhosa] I told you Angela's not welcome at Bhengu events.
translation.es: Te dije que no la queríaen nuestros eventos.

translation.en: [in English] She's a very powerful journalist, what she says goes. This is big.
translation.es: Es una periodista influyentey esto es muy importante.

translation.en: So, Dad, what do you think?
translation.es: ¿Y bien, papá? - ¿Qué piensas?- Excelente trabajo, hija.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Excellent job, my girl.
[in English] Don't stress! [in Xhosa] Have some champagne and meet some nice girls.
translation.es: Relájate. Bebe champaña,busca a alguna chica.

translation.en: [in English] The walls could have been bigger.
translation.es: - Ay, papá…- Los murales podrían ser más altos.

translation.en: Of course, Grace.
You did great, Linda.
[man] This way for a photo.
Sorry I'm late.
Why do you insist on looking like a garden boy, Ndumiso?
translation.es: ¿Por qué insistesen parecer un pordiosero, Ndumiso?

translation.en: -Come on, Ma. -Smile.
[in Xhosa] We’re taking the family photo with or without Phila.
translation.es: Sacaremos la foto familiarcon o sin Phila.

translation.en: -[in English] Hi, fam. -[Don] You're late.
I made it with five minutes to spare.
[in Xhosa] Let's do this.
[in English] Bhengu smile.
[Don] That's baby number what? [Grace] Six.
[in Xhosa] Where’s your baby number one?
[in English] Mr. Bhengu, quick question, please.
Why ask the public to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty
translation.es: ¿Por qué le pidieron al públicoque votara por la cara de Bhengu,

translation.en: but not have them at this event?
translation.es: pero no lo invitaron al evento?

translation.en: You sure your company's committed to the things you speak about?
translation.es: ¿Está comprometida la compañíacon lo que dice?

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Reserve your questions until after the launch.
translation.es: Dejemos las preguntaspara después de la presentación.

translation.en: [in English] And then you can be the judge.
[in Xhosa] She's always asking unnecessary questions.
[Thando in English] This is stunning, Linda.
-[Ndu] Well done. -[Linda] Thanks!
[Phila] How much did this cost?
[Linda in Xhosa] No, don’t ask too many questions.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
put your hands together for the CEO of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.es: démosle un aplausoal CEO de Bhengu Beauty,

translation.en: Mr. Don Bhengu!
If you told me 15 years ago that, uh…
translation.es: Si hace 15 años me hubieran dicho…

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty would become one of the biggest beauty companies in the country,
translation.es: que Bhengu Beauty estaríaentre las compañías más exitosas del país,

translation.en: soon Africa,
I would have told you, "You are absolutely right!"
translation.es: les habría dicho:"¡Claro que así será!".

translation.en: Yes!
I built this company with my own bare hands.
translation.es: Creé esta compañíacon mis propias manos.

translation.en: No political connections,
no capital,
no help whatsoever.
But tonight…
tonight we are here to unveil the new face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.es: estamos aquí para presentara la nueva cara de Bhengu Beauty.

translation.en: I left the choice to a public vote because
I wanted to provide an opportunity to someone who reminds me of myself,
translation.es: porque quería darle una oportunidada alguien que me recordara a mí

translation.en: before I became the Don Bhengu.
Someone without privilege,
someone unvarnished,
an underdog to represent us all.
translation.es: alguien que nos represente a todos.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen…
ushering in a new dawn as the newest face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.es: quien marca el inicio de otra eracomo la nueva cara de Bhengu Beauty,

translation.en: Zinhle Manzini!
What the hell?
[in Sotho] Linda! Go fix it.
[in English] Now. Now. Go. Go.
Looks like Bhengu Beauty hasn't changed its colors after all.
translation.es: Parece que, al final,Bhengu Beauty no cambió nada.

translation.en: [Ndu] Hey.
I could get you something a little stronger if you like.
translation.es: Si quieres,puedo traerte algo más fuerte.

translation.en: [Don in Xhosa] What nonsense is this?
translation.es: ¿Qué fue toda esa mierda? ¡Ahora quedamos como idiotas!

translation.en: Now we look like fools.
[Grace] Let's take this home. [Don] Damn it.
Everyone’s going to call us hypocrites.
[in English] Ndu, take Zinhle to the car.
-How did this-- -Why must I repeat myself. Just do it.
[in Xhosa] Did you mess this up? You too busy partying?
translation.es: ¿Fue tu culpa? - ¿Por andar de fiesta?- No fui yo.

translation.en: [Phila in English] I didn't do this!
translation.es: - ¿Por andar de fiesta?- No fui yo.

translation.en: I specifically told the designers to not change her complexion.
translation.es: Les dije a los diseñadoresque no retocaran su piel.

translation.en: -Everything was perfect when I-- -Obviously not!
translation.es: - Todo estaba bien…- Por lo visto, no.

translation.en: We're trying to show we're not stuck in the past
-and what do-- -[Linda] I'll fix it!
I'll get to the bottom of this. Listen…
[in Xhosa] I’m sorry.
I’m sorry.
[in English] Get Peter to bring the car.
[Don in Xhosa] This is a disaster.
The driver could have brought me.
[scoffs] No, I don't mind.
Yeah. [clears throat]
This is all going blow over in like a day or two.
translation.es: Todos se olvidarán de estoen un par de días.

translation.en: You'll see for yourself.
I don't know how anyone could be so negligent. You know?
translation.es: No sé cómo pudieronser tan descuidados.

translation.en: Okay, let me.
It's okay. I can do it.
Yeah. Okay.
I bet this has never happened to Naomi Campbell.
translation.es: Seguro que esto nunca le pasóa Naomi Campbell.

translation.en: Oh no, actually it has. I once helped her out just like this.
translation.es: En realidad, sí.Una vez la ayudé igual que ahora.

translation.en: I'm joking. I've never met her. [laughs]
Very funny.
Give me your hand.
-Okay… -Okay.
There you go.
This…
-Of course. -For you.
Thank you.
You'll get your jacket tomorrow.
[Ndu] Sure.
[Don] Damn it.
Twitter is abuzz.
Ah, yeah, well, Linda will figure out what happened, and we will do what we do best.
translation.es: Bueno, Linda averiguará qué pasó,y haremos lo que mejor sabemos hacer:

translation.en: We will handle it.
Relax, old man.
[Thando] Actually, I'm going to my room.
No, you stay exactly where you are. I need everyone here.
translation.es: No, quédate ahí.Los necesito a todos aquí.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Regina, call Zinhle.
[in English] I need a double.
Thando will do it.
You can see your favorite son is already doing it.
translation.es: Ya lo está haciendo tu hijo favorito.

translation.en: I'll have a Chardonnay.
What a fuck-up.
[in Zulu] Dad. [in English] As I said, we will handle it.
My people are already tweeting in our favor.
translation.es: Mi gente ya está tuiteandoa nuestro favor.

translation.en: -[Thando] Do you want a drink? -Yeah.
There you are, Zinhle.
-[in Sotho] Any journalists called you? -No, Mam' Grace.
If they do, no comment.
[in English] That goes for all of you.
PR is coming over,
and we're going to say it was a technical malfunction.
translation.es: y vamos a decirque fue una falla técnica.

translation.en: Get it?
End of story.
You can go.
Mam' Grace?
[Grace] Yes.
[in Sotho] Do you remember that I still need to go
to my cousin's after-funeral cleansing?
translation.es: por la muerte de mi primo?

translation.en: [in English] Your cousin is not family, Zinhle.
translation.es: Tu primo no es familia, Zinhle.

translation.en: The events company messed up the images. They can't explain what happened.
translation.es: La empresa de eventos tuvo la culpa, no saben qué pasó.

translation.en: -[Grace] Linda, that's not good enough. -I know that, Grace.
translation.es: Linda, eso no basta. Lo sé, Grace.

translation.en: Okay, that's why I fired them.
-[Don] Good night. -Ahem. Good night.
Dad, is there anything I…
[Don] No, you've already done enough.
Thando?
[in Sotho] What did I say to you
about your sulking in public?
translation.es: de poner mala cara en público?

translation.en: [in English] I'm so sorry.
Drink, Mom?
No thanks, and put that down. No more drinking for you.
translation.es: No, gracias.Y deja eso, ya no bebas más.

translation.en: -Yes, definitely not. -You called?
[sighs] We need to talk.
[Zinhle] Your favorite.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
[in Zulu] To be honest… [in English] I should be getting you chocolates after the day you had.
translation.es: Yo debería comprarte chocolates a tidespués del día que tuviste.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Are you okay?
[in English] It was weird seeing my face like that, as though it was bleached or something.
translation.es: Fue raro ver mi cara ahí,como blanqueada o algo así,

translation.en: [in Zulu] But I'm okay.
I'm sorry.
[in English] How much damage do you think this will do to Bhengu Beauty?
translation.es: ¿Qué tanto crees que dañará estoa Bhengu Beauty?

translation.en: [in Zulu] I don't know.
[in English] As you heard, PR statements are being made, woh, woh, woh, woh.
translation.es: Ya oíste, van a prepararsus declaraciones…

translation.en: I wonder how long people will be talking about it.
translation.es: Me preguntohasta cuándo se hablará del tema.

translation.en: What did I do to deserve these, really?
[in Zulu] I just wanted to thank you. [in English] For being my friend here for the past four weeks.
translation.es: Quería agradecertepor ser mi amiga este último mes.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You'll get used to this place.
[in English] Even the royal bitchness herself.
translation.es: Incluso a la reina de las arpías.

translation.en: But, it's good to have a new friend around here.
translation.es: Es bueno teneruna amiga nueva aquí.

translation.en: Oh, Don.
[in Sotho] Where are you off to?
[in English] Partners are freaked out after last night.
I need to make a few calls.
[in Sotho] I'll ask Regina to bring some coffee to the study.
translation.es: Le diré a Reginaque te lleve un café al estudio.

translation.en: [in English] I'm actually going to the office.
translation.es: Voy a ir a la oficina.

translation.en: [in Sotho] It's Saturday. I've arranged a relaxing spa treatment.
translation.es: Es sábado,programé una sesión de masajes.

translation.en: [in English] I'll be back for dinner.
[Zinhle] How's everything with you?
[in Zulu] Yesterday you seemed like you were a little sad.
[in English] You know what it's like with Grace.
translation.es: Ya sabes cómo es con Grace.

translation.en: "Smile, dear, we're in public."
It's exhausting.
What's it like being a second wife?
I wouldn't recommend it,
but what I do recommend is some wine with these chocolates.
translation.es: Pero lo que sí recomiendoes un vino con estos chocolates.

translation.en: Hmm? Stolen from Grace's collection, of course.
translation.es: Robado de la colección de Grace.

translation.en: [chuckles] It's not even midday yet. -[Thando] Really? -Mmm.
But it is the weekend, right?
[woman] I'm coming.
Hi! I missed you so much.
I'll bet you did.
Of course.
Oh, babe, I heard about the launch.
translation.es: Amor, me enteré de lo que pasó.

translation.en: Shh. I'm not here for that.
No?
Oh. Okay.
[Don] I've got something for you.
-You do? -Yes.
It's so beautiful! Thank you.
-[Don] Wait, babe… -Hmm?
[Don] Stop. -What? -Call an ambulance.
What do you mean? What's going on?
-Stop… -Oh my God, what's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.es: - Para.- Cielos, ¿qué…? - ¿Estás bien?- Llama a una ambulancia.

translation.en: Call an ambulance.
[Ruby] Babe, what's wrong? Okay.
[in Sotho] I don't know.
Grace doesn't want me to go.
translation.es: Grace no quiere que me vaya.

translation.en: She took…
I have to go, I'll call you back.
[in English] Does… Does Mam' Grace need me?
No, um…
Would you like to grab something to eat?
I figured you could use an escape.
translation.es: Pensé que te haría bien salir.

translation.en: Ah. Thanks, but I'm going to sleep early.
translation.es: Gracias, pero voy a acostarme temprano.

translation.en: Of course. Um… yeah, just shout if you need anything.
[in Sotho] That's the spot.
[in English] No, man.
Oh, Noni. Eish!
Yes?
Where is he?
[in Sotho] We're here for Don Benghu. Where is he?
-[in English] Is he okay? -With you in a second.
translation.es: ¿Está bien? - Ya los atiendo.- Por favor, díganos.

translation.en: [Linda] Please, just tell us.
translation.es: - Ya los atiendo.- Por favor, díganos.

translation.en: Hey! When I talk to you, you listen!
-Where's my husband? -Mama, she's gonna get to us.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está mi esposo?- Mamá, ya nos dirá.

translation.en: Is there a doctor or someone we can talk to?
Mrs. Bhengu?
[in Sotho] What kind of service is this?
You're a private hospital and we're waiting in reception?
translation.es: ¿Es un hospital privadoy nos hacen esperar?

translation.en: -[in English] Where's my husband? -[in Tswana] Sorry, ma'am. Come with me.
translation.es: - ¿Y mi esposo?- Lo siento. Vengan conmigo.

translation.en: [in English] Just tell us if he's okay.
[in Zulu] Sis' Regina, where's everyone?
[in Xhosa] They're all at the hospital. Bab' Don had a heart attack.
translation.es: En el hospital. El señor Don tuvo un infarto.

translation.en: -[in Tswana] He's in surgery right now. -[Linda in English] How long will it take?
He has a history of coronary artery disease.
When can we talk to the doctor?
[in Tswana] I'll have more information after the surgery.
translation.es: Tendré más informaciónluego de la cirugía.

translation.en: [in English] Excuse me.
Okay guys, whoa. It's just a little scare, okay.
translation.es: Bueno, a ver. Fue solo un susto.

translation.en: Dad is still young.
This stays right here. We've had enough PR disasters already.
translation.es: Esto no sale de aquí.Ya tuvimos demasiada mala prensa.

translation.en: [Ndu] Mama, who cares about PR?
Dad just has a heart attack. Ndumiso!
[in Sotho] We can't have people speculating.
translation.es: No podemos dejarque la gente hable, ¿sí?

translation.en: Phila, find out who he was with at the office when this happened.
translation.es: Phila, averigua quiénes estabanen la oficina cuando pasó.

translation.en: They can't talk. [in English] Done.
[Grace in Sotho] Linda.
-[in English] What? -[Grace] It's all your fault.
[in Sotho] Your carelessness…
[in English] Are you fucking kidding, Grace Mama, come on, that's unfair.
translation.es: - ¿Me estás jodiendo, Grace?- Mamá, eso no es justo.

translation.en: Linda, she didn't mean that.
Of course I did.
[Grace in Sotho] What are you doing here?
Sis' Regina told me what had happened.
translation.es: Regina me contó lo que había pasado.

translation.en: [in English] I thought I'd bring some snacks.
I doubt anyone is hungry.
Thank you.
It's like you read my mind. I'm famished.
translation.es: Me leíste la mente,me moría de hambre.

translation.en: [Zinhle] How's Bab' Don?
[Ndu] Um, still in surgery.
What is it?
He wasn't in the office.
His driver insisted he was there.
translation.es: Su chofer dijo que estaba ahí.

translation.en: [Phila] They found him at the company penthouse.
translation.es: Lo encontraronen el penthouse de la compañía.

translation.en: Was he alone?
I don't know.
Hey, this looks good. Is this you?
translation.es: Vaya, esto se ve bien. ¿Lo hiciste tú?

translation.en: -It's the least I could do. -Thank you.
translation.es: - Es lo menos que podía hacer.- Gracias.

translation.en: Zinhle.
You can go.
And don't you dare tell anyone about this.
translation.es: Y no hables de esto con nadie.

translation.en: Let me know if you need anything else.
[Thando] Thanks.
Oh yeah, um… let me walk you out.
No, no, it's fine.
Stay with everyone. I'll be okay.
-Hey. -Coffee?
Thank you.
You know that…
[in Xhosa] my father…
[in English] I don't have any family.
[in Zulu] But that's not true.
[in English] Ndu and Phila, they have Grace, and…
translation.es: Ndu y Phila tienen a Grace, y…

translation.en: -[Thando] But you've got me. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Tú me tienes a mí.- Sí.

translation.en: [Thando] No matter what, Grace cannot get rid of you.
translation.es: Y Grace no puede deshacerse de ti.

translation.en: And you? [sniffs]
Well, it wouldn't be the worst thing, right?
[in Zulu] Your father is going to make it through.
Don't worry.
Shit.
[Thando] What?
Bhengu boys, your father's going to need a lot of support at the office.
translation.es: Chicos, su padre va a necesitarmucha ayuda en la oficina.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Ma, can we stop talking about business for a second?
[in English] How are you? We could lose Dad.
Okay, hold on. We're not going to lose him.
translation.es: Bueno, a ver. No vamos a perderlo.

translation.en: I mean…
But he is right. Maybe we can cool it on the business talk.
translation.es: Pero Ndu tiene razón,olvidémonos del negocio ahora.

translation.en: Your father's going to need a successor sooner than later.
translation.es: Su padre va a necesitarun sucesor pronto.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Think Linda's just "chilling" right now?
translation.es: ¿Creen que a Linda se le olvidó?

translation.en: [in English] If that happens, then he's going to choose me.
translation.es: Si pasa eso, me elegirá a mí…

translation.en: Someone leaked the news of Dad all over social media.
translation.es: Alguien filtró la noticia en las redes.

translation.en: -What? -They said he's dying.
What did I say to all of you?
[in Sotho] I said do not speak to the press!
Who was it?
[in English] Who said something, guys? Who?
[Linda] Maybe it's Zinhle.
-Did you say-- -She's always around, so it makes sense.
Maybe someone heard us at reception.
translation.es: Quizá nos oyeron en la entrada.

translation.en: Look, I will talk to the board, okay.
And we'll make sure that we…
[in Sotho] Can we see him? [in Tswana] Yes, you can. But he's still resting.
[in English] To help with recovery. So bear that in mind.
Don?
Ngcolosi.
[in Sotho] Don't you ever scare us like that again.
[Linda in Xhosa] Dad, please hold on.
Please, I still need you.
[Grace] Linda.
[in English] Thank you.
Well, I know that you're gonna be out of here in a couple of days. So…
translation.es: Bueno, sé que saldrás de aquíen un par de días, así que…

translation.en: [Ndu] Stay strong, Dad.
We love you.
Get well, Ngcolosi.
Excuse me, hi, did I not leave my phone here?
[Linda] This is a curse.
[sighs] And this is my cue to go to bed.
translation.es: Y esa es mi señal para irme a dormir.

translation.en: Good night, everybody. Thank you.
If it isn't a curse, what is it?
First the launch… [in Xhosa] …and now Dad. This is a curse.
translation.es: La presentación, lo de papá…Es una maldición.

translation.en: -[in English] It's not a curse. -Uh-huh. Thank you.
But it is an opportunity.
-Guys, we've been wasting our time… -Ndumiso.
[in Sotho] It's not time for one of your sermons. Go to bed.
translation.es: No es momento para sermones,vete a dormir.

translation.en: Why are you up?
I was worried.
How is Bab' Don doing?
[in English] That's not for you to worry about.
[in Sotho] Go to sleep.
[Ndu in English] She's just trying to be nice, Mom.
Zinhle?
[in Sotho] Did you tell anyone about Don's heart attack?
translation.es: ¿Le contaste a alguienlo del infarto de Don?

translation.en: No, Mam' Grace. My phone's been off the whole night.
translation.es: No, tuve el teléfono apagadotoda la noche.

translation.en: [in English] Good.
Oh, that cleansing thing…
you can go.
[in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] Some of these vultures.
[in Sotho] They wish their cards read "Rest in Peace."
translation.es: Desearían que sus tarjetasdijeran "descansa en paz".

translation.en: Goodness!
You'd swear I'm the one who had a heart attack.
translation.es: GRACE, ESTOY CONTIGO.CON AMOR, KOLOBE Pareciera que yo tuve el infarto.

translation.en: Get rid of these flowers.
Justice… were you on duty when my husband had a heart attack?
translation.es: Justice, ¿estabas trabajandocuando mi esposo tuvo el infarto?

translation.en: Who was he with?
[in Sotho] Hey, bro.
-Yay! -[in English] I made it. What up, though?
[in Sotho] I missed you.
I'm here now.
I thought I'd have to drag you back home. Hmm?
translation.es: Creí que tendríaque arrastrarte hasta casa.

translation.en: [in English] No. There's no need.
Okay.
[in Sotho] Let's go inside. Makhosi Mnisi is waiting.
-[Zinhle] This feels so final. -Yeah. [in Sotho] We have to stay strong for her.
translation.es: - Esto ya es definitivo.- Sí, debemos ser fuertes por ella.

translation.en: [Zinhle in Zulu] Greetings, Makhosi.
I still need to see other people. You're wasting my time.
translation.es: Hay más gente que me necesita.Malgastan mi tiempo.

translation.en: [Zinhle] I'm sorry. But I have a bottle of whiskey for you.
translation.es: Lo siento.Pero le traje una botella de whisky.

translation.en: Good girl. Where's my whiskey?
translation.es: - Buena chica.- ¿Y para mí no hay?

translation.en: Let's get to work.
[in Xhosa] Praise God.
When did you wake up? I've been up for a while now.
How are you feeling?
[in English] I'm so fit, I could run a marathon.
[in Xhosa] I've brought someone to see you.
translation.es: Traje a alguien para que te vea.

translation.en: [in English] Who's that?
[in Xhosa] Goodness.
[in English] What a pleasant surprise.
[in Xhosa] I'm glad to see you awake.
I brought a few traditional things.
[in Zulu] These Western doctors also need help.
[in Xhosa] Now we are talking.
[Makhosi in Zulu] Ancestors of the Selepe family,
the Elders and Protectors of this family,
translation.es: ancianos y protectores de esta familia,

translation.en: I ask that you allow me as a healer
translation.es: les pido que me permitanactuar como sanadora

translation.en: to cleanse these kids.
To cleanse them because there isn't an elder to do so.
translation.es: porque no hay ningún ancianoque pueda hacerlo.

translation.en: Please allow me to remove this dark cloud that follows them.
translation.es: Permítanme deshacermede la nube oscura que los sigue

translation.en: And to remove these dark spirits that follow them.
translation.es: y de los espíritus oscurosque los rodean,

translation.en: Spirits that took their sister, Amahle.
translation.es: aquellos que se llevarona su hermana, Amahle.

translation.en: Please allow me to do this so that their paths can be cleared.
translation.es: Por favor, permítanme hacer estopara despejar sus caminos.

translation.en: Makhosi!
[in Xhosa] It's strong.
Can you feel it? I can feel it working already.
-That's good. -[clears throat] -That's what we want to hear. -[chuckles]
[in Sotho] I didn't know you called for Simphiwe [in Xhosa] I brought her, Grace.
translation.es: - No sabía que la habías llamado.- Yo la traje, Grace.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Linda, you know your father's treatments can't…
[in English] I know what's good for me, Grace.
translation.es: Sé lo que es bueno para mí, Grace.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Thank you, my child. You can go.
translation.es: Gracias, hija. - Puedes irte.- Muy bien.

translation.en: -[Linda] All right. -Simphiwe.
You've really helped me.
[in English] We should be more careful. [Don] Sit down.
What did the doctor say? I said sit down.
translation.es: - ¿Qué dijo el médico?- Les dije que se sentaran.

translation.en: There's going to be a few changes in our lives.
translation.es: Va a haber algunos cambiosen nuestras vidas.

translation.en: I need more children.
[Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids.
translation.es: Sabes que no puedo tener más…

translation.en: [in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.es: No tengo tiempo que perder,así que me casaré de nuevo.

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
translation.es: Ya tengo a alguien que me dará hijos.

translation.en: You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.es: ¡No puedes decidir algo asísin mi permiso!

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
[in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you so he could have his entertainment at home.
translation.es: Dejé que se casara contigopara que se divirtiera en casa.

translation.en: Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here? [in English] What's that?
translation.es: ¿Por qué busca en otro ladosi te tiene a ti? ¿Qué pasa?

translation.en: Do you want to go and ask him yourself?
[in Zulu] You heard what he said.
He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.es: Quiere más hijos,y ambas sabemos que yo no pude…

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
Smile, dear, we're in public.
[Ruby] Excuse me!
[in Zulu] Who are you?
[Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
[in Zulu] Who are you?
I'm Ruby.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
translation.es: Noni, ¿ese nombre no es de puta?

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
[in English] Test her.
Test me for what?
I'm not pregnant. Why would…
I'm calling security.
No, you're not!
Your choice.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
I'm not the bad guy here.
translation.es: Yo no soy la mala aquí,

translation.en: You're the one sleeping with my husband.
translation.es: tú te acuestas con mi esposo.

translation.en: We can do this painlessly if you want.
translation.es: Esto no tiene por qué doler.

translation.en: Good girl.
Now go with the lovely nurse.
[in Sotho] Why are you laughing?
-Nana? -[groans]
Amahle.
[in Sotho] Are you okay?
I'm fine.
For Chancer.
For helping me win the online competition and the pictures at the launch.
translation.es: por ayudarme a ganar el concursoy con lo de la presentación.

translation.en: No problem.
How're you coping?
How are you coping?
You're all alone here now.
I'm fine.
I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.es: Yo no tengo que vera Grace y a Don todos los días.

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
translation.es: Me metí en la habitación de Donen el hospital.

translation.en: He looked so weak.
He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.es: No parecía el hombre aterradorque conocimos de niños.

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
You're not a murderer.
I know.
He has to live…
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.es: para ver cómo destruimostodo lo que ama.

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.es: Solo pasaron seis mesesdesde que perdimos a Amahle.

translation.en: If you need time…
-Time? -If you want to back out… No!
I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.es: No necesito tiempo. Hay que hacerlo.

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
I did, but you don't need it.
I do.
[in English] Just in case things go wrong.
[in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Sotho] We're in this together.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
How old are you?
[in English] Twenty-two, 23, 24--
Twenty-one.
Twenty what?
-Twenty-one. -Twenty-one?
You're a baby.
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three.
translation.es: Si se casan, serás la tercera esposa,

translation.en: Last on the list.
[in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
[in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.es: Pero no dejará de acostarsecon otras chicas.

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
By the time you turn 23…
[in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
[in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.es: Porque el apellido Bhenguno se mancha con un divorcio.

translation.en: Goodness.
[in English] Negative.
Perfect.
Now,
if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
translation.es: si no quieres sufrir el resto de tu vida,

translation.en: you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
translation.es: dirás y harás exactamentelo que yo te diga.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Understood?
[in Xhosa] You're back.
[in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.es: ¿Está Grace en casa?Quería avisarle que volví.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] She's not here.
[in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.es: Come conmigo. Si no, habrá que tirar toda la comida.

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
Come. Come sit down.
Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
Oh, he's coming back tomorrow.
He's awake?
[chuckles] Yeah. Actually, he's doing well.
[Zinhle] Who took these?
[Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
translation.es: Yo, en la escuela de arte.

translation.en: [Zinhle] They're really good.
Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.es: Sí. Estaba buscando unaque pudiera imprimir y enmarcar

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
translation.es: como regalo de bienvenida para papá.

translation.en: -Uh… [laughs] -[in Zulu] Is this you?
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago.
translation.es: Sí, es de hace dos años,

translation.en: When I used to copy everything Phila used to do,
translation.es: cuando copiaba a Phila en todo.

translation.en: before the accident. What accident?
Check this out.
I crashed my Porsche.
They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.es: Tuvieron que sacarme.Tardé dos meses en recuperarme.

translation.en: I remember thinking to myself, I could have died without living a meaningful life.
translation.es: Recuerdo que pensé que habría muertosin haber vivido una vida plena.

translation.en: Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.es: Ahora intento buscarleun significado más profundo a la vida.

translation.en: [chuckles] Still looking.
I have to go.
Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
Ruby?
I'm home.
What the hell is this?
Ruby?
Ruby?
Hey.
What's this?
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.es: Me voy, Don. No puedo seguir con esto.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
-Come here. -No.
This repulsive relationship is over.
Repulsive?
You're old enough to be my father,
and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
translation.es: y me merezco algo más que un arreglo.

translation.en: [Don] An arrangement?
I want to marry you, start a family.
You already have a family.
Please don't… don't go.
I'm sorry I have to go,
and please delete my number.
translation.es: Y por favor, borra mi número.

translation.en: Ruby?
Ruby.
[in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.es: no queremos que muera atragantadoluego de sobrevivir a un infarto.

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
[in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.
translation.es: No, dijo que lo traería su chofer.

translation.en: Morning, Mam' Grace.
Phila. Regina.
[in English] Zinhle. Looking good.
[in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
translation.es: Gracias por dejarme ir al ritual ayer.

translation.en: [in English] Nice hair.
[in Sotho] The styles I arranged… you've switched them up, huh?
I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
translation.es: Me gusta la ropa también. Gira.

translation.en: Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
translation.es: Envíale una selfi a Sontopara que la suban a las redes.

translation.en: [in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
I'll do that.
[in Sotho] You know, in my day…
you had to be taller and lighter… to be considered beautiful.
translation.es: había que ser más alta y delgadapara ser considerada atractiva.

translation.en: [Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.es: Mamá, no puedes decir esas cosas.

translation.en: [Grace] I'm just saying.
[in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.es: Cuando ganó el concurso,estuve a esto de invalidar el resultado.

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model,
translation.es: Sí, no es la típica modelo,

translation.en: but she is beautiful and she is likable.
You're right.
There's something recognizable about her.
[Phila] Yeah?
Oh, Regina.
[in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
translation.es: Ay, Regina. Dame el cuchillo. Te mostraré.

translation.en: Like this.
[in English] You can let go, Nana.
[in Sotho] They will pay.
I'll make sure of it.
[sniffling] Amahle.
Amahle!
Amahle.
